prompts: Create a sleek, futuristic Pokemon that dominates steel and dragon elements.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a tall, metallic tower with sharp edges.
Generate a steel-type creature with a sharp, angular design and a blue color scheme.
Make a dragon-like Pokemon that features a silver body and blue accents.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines the toughness of steel with a dragon's fierceness.
Design a powerful creature with a unique triangular shape and a shiny metallic surface.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies speed and precision, with a sleek silver and gray design.
